import React from 'react'; import Header from '../Layout/Header' import Copyright from '../Layout/Copyright' import Footer from '../Layout/Footer' import Clientlogo from '../Layout/Clientlogo'; import { addCartApiUrl } from '../Properties/AppConfig'; import { addCartData } from '../Service/ProdService'; const Cart = () => { React.useEffect(() => { let pcode = (new URLSearchParams(window.location.search)).get("pcode") if (pcode !== null && sessionStorage.getItem('username') !== null) { let postUrl = addCartApiUrl let getDataString = { "username": sessionStorage.getItem('username'), "productid": pcode } addCartData(postUrl, getDataString).then(obj => { if (obj.data) { } }) } }, []) return (
